R

refresh() - Method in class calculMat.MatRes
updates the MatRes, sets to RESINACTIF tiles that are RESACTIF and that are not connected to producing tiles
refreshHappiness() - Method in class model.CityResources

refreshMatRes() - Method in class model.CityResources
refresh the MatRes Matrix for the next round
RefreshView - Class in ui
RefreshView is a class meant to handle the timer refresh
RefreshView(GameBoard) - Constructor for class ui.RefreshView
creates a timer with 3 speed: pause, speed1 and speed2 , the timer automatically gives the nextstate instruction is a speed has been chosen until the player hit the pause button again.
resetEphemerals() - Method in class model.CityResources
Reset ephemeral resources.
